author: kilasuit
body: This helps others get setup with the SSH Demo and stops them from getting the error that is reported in #2003 but does not fix the error message being output.

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
Hi **@kilasuit**, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! You've already signed the contribution license agreement. Thanks!

The agreement was validated by Microsoft and real humans are currently evaluating your PR.

TTYL, MSBOT;

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: This will stop Questions like this being asked in the community as see on reddit https://www.reddit.com/r/PowerShell/comments/4ziw85/anyone_manage_to_get_enterpssession_or/?utm_source=ifttt

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: This looks good to me.  But I would add something to indicate that adding the OpenSSH path is an alternative to providing the full ssh.exe path in the sshd_config file.

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body:
@PaulHigin - where is it that your referring to in the sshd_config file as I don't have any paths in my file that links to ssh.exe in there at all.

The only close one I have in my sshd_config is 
Subsystem   sftp    C:/Program Files/OpenSSH/sftp-server.exe

Happy to add to it if I know what it is that I need to add in :-)

comments.author: PaulHigin
comments.body: Sorry!  I was thinking of sshd.exe and not ssh.exe.  Please disregard the above comment.  I think this change is good as is.

title: Updated SSH Demo doc in line with error in #2003
